question: Hi, my name is Anna. I'm going to ask you a few questions. You can skip any that you don't want to answer. Are you ready to get started?
Is there anything that you need urgently such as food, car repair, housing, or eviction assistance?
What do you need the most right now?
Where are you located?
How old are you?
What is your race?
Gender?
Do you identify as trans?
What is your sexual orientation?
Are you married or have you ever been married?
What is the highest level of education you have?
Are you employed? If so, what is your approximate monthly income?
Do you have transportation?
What is your current housing situation?
How many people live with you?
Do you have any dependents? (children, elders, pets)
Have you ever been homeless?
Are you currently homeless?
When was the last time you ate?
Do you have a mailing address? If so, what is it?
Are there any other adults who live at that address?
Are you a military veteran? If so, which branch?
Have you ever worked for the federal, state, or local government? If so, which department?
Have you ever been arrested or convicted of a crime?
Have you ever been the victim of a crime?
Do you have any outstanding debts, including things like student loans or credit card debts? Approximately how much do you owe?
Have you used government services before? If so, which ones?
Have you applied for aid from non-profit groups before?
Are you interested in doing so now?
Thanks, that's all the questions I have. I really appreciate your help! May I have your email address so I can send you a follow up email?
